article_title: Firings, hirings key in bid to recall Rivera
article_text:
North Andover, MA (01845)

Today

Some clouds and possibly an isolated thunderstorm this afternoon. High 87F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%..

Tonight

Some clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 66F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Keith Eddings keddings@eagletribune.com

og.description: LAWRENCE — The first of two efforts to recall Mayor Daniel Rivera heads to a finale Wednesday, when the clock runs out on the 30 days for organizers to collect
